name: Neodocs
headline: Instant lab tests on your smartphone
description:
Neodocs lets you perform instant lab tests on your smartphone. Our users are health optimizers and athletes who want to improve key nutritional markers for better performance.

You simply collect your sample, take a picture, and results are instantly generated.

We are the perfect team to build this. Anurag is a 3-time medical entrepreneur who‚Äôs built medical devices, Pratik has worked on AI/ML models for leading US banks, and  Nikunj comes from a consulting background at Bain & Co.

We‚Äôre building your personal lab on your phone.

founders.name: Nikunj Malpani, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder @ Neodocs | Ex-Bain & Co | IIT Bombay

founders.name: Anurag Meena, Founder
founders.description:
I like building stuff. Worked across both hardware and software. 

Passionate about healthcare. Have built a data driven healthcare startup and a medical device design company previously. Always up for discussing the next Big things in technology.

# Results for 10 parameters across 7 panels
Easy to understand digital results and actionable insights for the panels put you in control and and help you take the next steps.
# Monitor trends to track improvement
By testing regularly you can monitor trends to notice any improvement or deterioration in the health and take the required next steps
# Tailor-made recommendations
Everyone is unique based on their biomarker. We personalised the next steps for each user based on their current lifestyle, results and age. Speak to our medical advisors for further guidance.
# One app that takes care of it all.
Download the Neodocs app and turn your smartphone into your personal wellness tracker today!
[![Get it on Google Play](https://play.google.com/intl/en_us/badges/static/images/badges/en_badge_web_generic.png)](https://www.neodocs.in/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.app.neodocs&pcampaignid=pcampaignidMKT-Other-global-all-co-prtnr-py-PartBadge-Mar2515-1>)[![Download on the App Store](https://tools.applemediaservices.com/api/badges/download-on-the-app-store/black/en-us?size=250x83&releaseDate=1628553600&h=9fe675414fa4d50ce298fc80da620207)](https://www.neodocs.in/<https:/apps.apple.com/in/app/neodocs/id1579332354?itsct=apps_box_badge&itscg=30200>)

![wave-pattern](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Wave.svg)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Rushabh Rambhia.jpg)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Yash Sakhlecha.jpg)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Venkatesh Amrutwar.jpg)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Rucha Walawalkar.jpg)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Akash Gangwar.jpg)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Kapil Deshpande.jpg)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Jaivardhan Lal.jpg)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Manasvi Paradkar.jpg)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/ShrutiKhairkar.jpg)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/rajendra.png)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/rajesh.png)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/testimo3.png)![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/testimo4.png)
Love this app, I use it every other week to gauge my progress and it really goes hand in hand with my performance. If I lack water it will let me know, and when I follow the instructions my performance is amazing. Give it a go you will not be disappointed!
![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Rushabh Rambhia.jpg)
Rushabh Rambhia
happy user
I love this product. Made my whole family try and now we are having a competition to see who can score 10/10 for everything first! I like how it gives suggestions on things like what you can eat to improve your pH levels. Very easy to use.
![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Kapil Deshpande.jpg)
Kapil Deshpande
happy user
This product is simple and personal. After only 1 minute, my analysis came on my screen. It gave me info about what nutrients I was lacking, along with the need to hydrate.
![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Venkatesh Amrutwar.jpg)
Venkatesh Amrutwar
happy user
Personalized nutrition advice is amazing. I can track my body data at home. It is like 2030
![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Akash Gangwar.jpg)
Akash Gangwar
happy user
Was extremely curious to try this and it has lived up to that. Love that they have registered nutritionists to guide with all queries.
![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Manasvi Paradkar.jpg)
Manasvi Paradkar
happy user
It‚Äôs great how the results are on your phone right away. I will keep using it because it allows me to see results in the comfort of my own home. Using it is a part of my weekly routine now.
![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Rucha Walawalkar.jpg)
Rucha Walawalkar
happy user
Was an eye-opener. Didn‚Äôt know my hydration levels were so off. Love that all guidance has been backed by detailed research.
![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Jaivardhan Lal.jpg)
Jaivardhan Lal
happy user
App is perfect, strips are very easy to use. Thank you very much guys I am a lazy person but I can finally track my health status and give attention to my body.
![Neodocs review](https://www.neodocs.in/docassets/img/testimonials/Yash Sakhlecha.jpg)
Yash Sakhlecha
happy user

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Neodocs**

Founded in 2020 and the proud participant of Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch S21, Neodocs is revolutionizing health diagnostics by putting a personal lab right in your smartphone. Based in India, the company consists of a skilled team of 20 individuals, including co-founders Anurag, a three-time medical entrepreneur, Pratik, an AI/ML expert from US banking, and Nikunj, who has a consulting pedigree from Bain & Co. Their mission? To enable users, particularly health optimizers and athletes, to perform instant lab tests and track nutritional markers for enhanced performance.

**How It Works**

Using the Neodocs app is straightforward: simply collect a sample, snap a picture, and get instant results. This unique, user-friendly approach empowers individuals to measure important health parameters swiftly and conveniently. The app can track a range of health indicators, covering aspects such as hydration, kidney health, liver health, and urinary tract infections, via various care kits offered by Neodocs.

**Why Neodocs?**

At its core, Neodocs is about personalization and convenience. With results available in real-time and recommendations tailored to each user based on their unique biometric data, it provides actionable insights that help people make informed health decisions. Their technology not only allows for easy monitoring of progress but also supports users in setting health goals.

**Product Offerings**

Neodocs provides several specialized care kits, including:
- **Wellness Care Kit**
- **UTI Care Kit**
- **Kidney Care Kit**

Alongside these, users can expect comprehensive analysis and smart reporting tailored to their unique lifestyle and health needs, facilitated by registered nutritionists who are ready to assist.

**Community Feedback**

Neodocs has garnered positive reviews from users who appreciate the app's ease of use and the valuable health insights it offers. Customers report significant improvements in their understanding of personal health metrics, making this a powerful tool in their fitness journeys.

To explore more, check out their website at [Neodocs](https://www.neodocs.in). With Neodocs, the future of personal health tracking is at your fingertips‚Äîinstantly, conveniently, and affordably.
